alert.note: Alert for Clark; Jackson; Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Clark, northern Jackson and southern Taylor Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 228 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong cluster of thunderstorms from near Medford to 6 miles north of Fairchild. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Medford around 235 PM CDT. Neillsville around 250 PM CDT. Shortville around 300 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Highway 73 And 98, Polley, The Black River Correctional Center, Atwood, Tioga, Perkinstown, Potters Flowage, Lynn, Eidsvold and Longwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
